channel.title: [Delta]New Cloud's Buster blade model[Showoff]
channel.description:
My friend decided to make a updated/newer version of Cloud's buster blade
*here is the picture he is working with* [img]https://encrypted-tbn0.google.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTCmu2qHuNMsJBpZdyauCIY6_N_ZgZuPVu6PisgbNz2yR0zEf54[/img]
okay heres the models in the game (all side view)
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/30tgnsw.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/25rcnb6.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/23tihe8.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qvt5km.png[/img]
My friend is finishing the last and final part of these models..the goal of these models are/is to make a parts of the cloud's buster blade and combine it to make his sword which is the last sword in the picture...hope you guys like

item.title: [Delta]New Cloud's Buster blade model[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

rip4d:

Because we don’t want to see this section flooded with multiple threads only showing the same model. It’s not like we make multiple runescape goal threads when only one is necessary for our goals. Same concept here.

yes we are updating it, yet it is a different sword…the last sword was a old model

old model

new model

we are trying to make this sword a godsword type where/if you have all these models it will make the new model…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]New Cloud's Buster blade model[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:456312”]Because we don’t want to see this section flooded with multiple threads only showing the same model. It’s not like we make multiple runescape goal threads when only one is necessary for our goals. Same concept here.[/quote]This is a completely different model, he released the last one, this is a showoff thread. Runescape’s section has a LOT more activity than here. I understand if it gets out of hand (i.e only changing one thing, then posting a new thread).

Read full topic

You’ll learn later, maybe from a moderator, that threads containing the same content should be placed in the same thread. To me they’re very small, barely able to see detail.
